thread.title: Sharon Robertson
thread.title_full: Trade Tested reviewed by Sharon Robertson

author: Sharon Robertson
title: Sharon Robertson
text: I recently purchases two xlarge dog pens with sun shelter, we bought these to go with another two that were purchases last year and we have made enclosures for our four Flemish Giant Rabbits, these give them a great run added onto their hutches and they are easy to get at to feed and clean out and shape can be changed around as required. If needed we can take apart and have indoors should we need to in case of bad weather etc. Highly recommend.
